channel.title: Cache Webclient problem
channel.description:
Im trying to make a webclient and i have been using ric914's TUT.. i have done everything but i cant seem to get the cache part rite... i load my client and it downloads the client and apperantly extracts it because i can see it in C:/ but then i get the Client Updated please reload client..retrying in 5,4,3,2,1 and so on.... I dont think im zipping the cache correctly...because i dont know what to put in the cache besides the sprites and the CACHE
how can i fix this... I have msn: corncake117@hotmail.com

item.title: Cache Webclient problem
item.dc:creator: @bloodpkrs bloodpkrs
item.description:
@bloodpkrs wrote:

Im trying to make a webclient and i have been using ric914’s TUT…
i have done everything but i cant seem to get the cache part rite…
i load my client and it downloads the client and apperantly extracts it because i can see it in C:/
but then i get the Client Updated please reload client…retrying in 5,4,3,2,1 and so on…
I dont think im zipping the cache correctly…because i dont know what to put in the cache besides the sprites and the CACHE

how can i fix this…
I have msn:
corncake117@hotmail.com
